original_text: It grew great, even to the host of heaven. And some of the host and some of the stars it threw down to the ground and trampled on them.
korean_text: 그것이 하늘 군대에 미칠 만큼 커져서 그 군대와 별들 중의 몇을 땅에 떨어뜨리고 그것들을 짓밟고

sentences.original_text: even to the host of heaven
And some of the host and some of the stars
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하늘의 군대 중 일부와 별들 중 일부를

sentences.original_text: it threw down to the ground
